name: Deep Down Caves
description:
A miner has to satisfy his employer's needs by going to a mine full of gems. The more ores he brings in, the more he can buy better equipment and go deeper into the mine.

Project realized for a school work, GTECH 2 of Gaming Campus.

Realized by Arthur Jouve, Raphaël Mateescu and Emilio Guillemet

INPUTS :
top arrow, down arrow, right arrow, left arrow
